name: Lethal Brutal Racing
description: You will be involved in violent races full of explosions, gunfire, jumps and dangerous obstacles on the tracks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 260 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio

reviews.review_text: Fortunately I got it for free. Don't buy this thing.   P.S.: How in the world the developer didn't noticed the minimap is mirrored? It's... It's... bah.

THE MOST BAD A$$ RACING GAME IN THE UNIVERSE OF ALL TIME. MAYBE IT HASN'T GOT THE GREATEST GRAPHICS OR THE BEST AMOUNT OF CARS OR WHATEVER BUT IT'S GOT MF'ING HEART AND THAT'S WHAT REALLY COUNTS. PLUS THE MOST BADA$$ SOUNDTRACK EVER.
